channel.title: [SFM] NUF FM - GAME OVER - Mafia, Zone and DatBird Victory
channel.description:
![](http://i.imgur.com/bLvfQUQ.jpg) ### "Expect the worst out of everything." #### Hosted by @Zone_Q11, reviewed by @eevee and @DatBird --- # Rules:
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). 2. Post a minimum of 10 smart and game related posts per Day Phase. 3. Do not forget to leave a vote at the end of the day. (Unless Majority was activated.) 4. Ignore either of the former two rules, and you will be given a warning. 5. Gather three warnings, and you will be subbed out or modkilled immediately. 6. I can and might have to add and/or remove rules in the future. Except GFR. Let's just hope that I won't have to use this rule.
# Sample role PMs: [details="Red Herring Role Samples"] > # You are Tilgarial, a [color=pink]Neutral Jester[/color] > ![](https://forum.novelupdates.com/data/avatars/l/108/108113.jpg?1587126240) > > You are a Jester without a BPV. > After you get lynched, you can kill a living player and nobody can do anything about it. > > *Get lynched. It's that easy. Don't overthink stuff.*
> # You are NZPIEFACE, a [color=000099]Serial Killer[/color] > ![](https://forum.novelupdates.com/data/avatars/l/16/16663.jpg?1508633681) > > You are a Serial Killer who can kill a player each Night Phase. > You probably hate randing as the role who needs to kill everyone, without anything else to help you. > So I'll throw you a bone and make your work easier. > > *Kill exactly one Mafia without revealing your role, and survive one night after you killed them. If you live past that night, you get to leave the game victoriously.*
> # You are seriouslynope, a [color=lightyellow]`[REDACTED]`[/color] > ![](https://forum.novelupdates.com/data/avatars/l/25/25027.jpg?1514615626) > > ****Special Mechanic 1:**** > Each night each player may decide to guess your identity. > If they are incorrect, they die bypassing all protections. > If they are correct, you die bypassing all protections and the guesser will get 1-Shot Day Vigilante Shot OR 1-Shot Strongman Cop Check for immediate use. (Their choice.) > In case of multiple correct guesses, the first winner will be picked. > > ****Special Mechanic 2:**** > You know all members of the Mafia. > > ****Special Mechanic 3:**** > Every Night, you will obtain the choice to be peeked as any role and alignment of your choice to all investigative roles. If you don't choose one, then it'll default to your last choice. > > ****Ability: `[REDACTED]`**** > `[REDACTED]` > > *`[REDACTED]` By achieving victory, everyone will die and you will be the sole winner of the game.* [/details]
# General Gameplay * Days are 48 hours unless majority is reached early and nights are 24 hours. * There are no logs / last will mechanics. * Self-votes are considered valid votes. * Votes are locked in MyLo and LyLo scenarios. * All votes must be in the form **/vote [name of player]** to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form **/unvote**. This is to enable the smooth processing of votes. * All actions must be submitted in your classcards. * Flips will be shown after a player dies. * The Mafia factional kill is NOT mandatory. * The Mafia factional kill IS assigned. That is, a specific member of the Mafia must be chosen to perform the factional kill. If no member is selected, the last member who submitted a kill will be assumed to perform it. * The Mafia will communicate through a private message. * The game starts when the player list is fully filled.
# Gameplay * The setup is closed with the exception of one role. * [u]This is a bastard game.[/u] * There is only 1 or 2 "bastard elements", and everything else is a red herring. * Lynches are majority and plurality. In cases of a tie, the lynch will be determined randomly among the players [u]outside the tie[/u]. * No Lynch is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In case No Lynch and a player are tied at the end of the day, No Lynch takes priority. * There is at least one Neutral, and one Neutral's card is partially shown at the Red Herring Role Samples; it's the one with `[REDACTED]` on it.
# Limited Feedback™ Summary: * Doctor healing: No * Getting healed: No * Roleblocked: No * Redirected: No * Transported: No * Getting attacked: No * Getting killed: Yes * Investigative results: Yes * Anything else: Probably No
# Player List:
1. Italy - Lynched D1 ([color=ff0000]**Ddraig, Mafia Gladiator**[/color]) 1. Ami - Killed N1 ([color=ligreen]**Evil_Ginger, Town Sanity Cop**[/color]) 1. Wazza - Killed D2 ([color=ligreen]**Lenaia, Town "Loved" Miller Fruit Vendor**[/color]) 1. PokemonKidRyan - Lynched D2 ([color=ff0000]**Parth37955, Mafia JOAT**[/color]) 1. ModeShifter - Suicide N2 ([color=ligreen]**AliceShiki, Town 1-Shot Guilty Day Vigilante**[/color]) 1. Alice - Killed N2 ([color=ligreen]**Tony, Town Odd Night Role Cop**[/color]) 1. ~~DannyThyGamer~~ Evil_Ginger - Lynched D3 ([color=ff0000]**Fossil, Mafia Godfather**[/color]) 1. clonedcheese - Suicide N3 ([color=ligreen]**Nurman, Town 1-Shot BPV Vanilla**[/color]) 1. EVO - Killed N3 ([color=ligreen]**Raneday, Town Sadist Seer**[/color]) 1. Crimson97 - Killed N3 ([color=ligreen]**Das, Town Weak Macho Doctor**[/color]) 1. GreenCatKid - Lynched D4 ([color=ligreen]**iampsyx, Town 1-Shot Guiltless Strongman Slankvig**[/color]) 1. oB_L1ght - Suicide N4 ([color=ligreen]**Satan, Town “Hated” 2-Shot Watcher**[/color]) 1. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ Fossil - Killed N4 ([color=ligreen]**Zone Q11, Town Alignment Cop**[/color]) 1. KyoDaz - Guessed N4 ([color=lightyellow]**seriouslynope, Neutral Plaguebearing Survivor**[/color]) 1. soolit - Killed D5 ([color=ligreen]**Electromaster, Town Bus Driver**[/color]) 1. Hippoyeetus - ENDGAMED ([color=ligreen]**NinjaPenguin, Town 2-Shot Paranoid Bar Owner**[/color]) 1. TrustworthyLiberal - VICTORIOUS ([color=ff0000]**SpearOfLies, Mafia Gambler**[/color])
### **Backups:** 1. ~~Fossil (Subbed in D1)~~ 2. ~~Evil_Ginger (Subbed in N1)~~
### **Spectators:**
1. Marshal 2. Amelia 3. astand 4. Napoleon 5. katze 6. Priestess 7. Jane 8. N.1 9. Emilia 10. SirDerpsAlot
### Thread Summary: - [D1 Start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-1-17-17-the-start-of-chaos/81472/2) - [Fossil subbed PoisonedSquid](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-1-17-17-the-start-of-chaos/81472/677) - [D1 End - Italy lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-1-16-17-the-result-of-silence/81472/1154) - [Evil_Ginger subbed DannyThyGamer](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-1-16-17-the-result-of-silence/81472/1162) - [D2 Start - Ami killed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-1-16-17-the-result-of-silence/81472/1170) - [Wazza killed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-2-15-17-false-sense-of-security/81472/2030) - [D2 End - PokemonKidRyan lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-2-14-17-smile-of-death/81472/3020) - [D3 Start - ModeShifter suicide, Alice killed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-2-13-17-mid-boss-defeated/81472/3021) - [D3 End - Evil_Ginger lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-3-11-17-off-to-wonderland/81472/3590) - [D4 Start - clonedcheese suicide, EVO killed, Crimson97 killed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-3-10-17-punishment-for-the-liars/81472/3595) - [D4 End - GreenCatKid lynched](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-4-7-17-the-final-day-of-insanity/81472/3961) - [`REDACTED` Clarification](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-4-6-17-inactivity-hater-killed-after-hours-of-inactivity/81472/3962) - [D5 Start - oB_L1ght suicide, Fossil killed, KyoDaz Guessed](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-night-4-6-17-inactivity-hater-killed-after-hours-of-inactivity/81472/3963) - [D5 TrustworthyLiberal shot soolit, GAME OVER](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-5-3-17-race-to-the-death/81472/3965) - [Special Thanks](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-5-3-17-race-to-the-death/81472/3972) - [soolit's, Hippoyeetus' and TrustworthyLiberal's roles](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-day-5-3-17-race-to-the-death/81472/3988) - [Google Sheet](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-nuf-fm-game-over-mafia-zone-and-datbird-victory/81472/4044)

item.title: [SFM] NUF FM - GAME OVER - Mafia, Zone and DatBird Victory
item.dc:creator: Jane
item.description:
TrustworthyLiberal's role was...

You are SpearOfLies , a Mafia Gambler

​

Passive: Neighbors
You are in a neighborhood. …that’s it.

Active: Strategize
During Night Phase, you may predict who will be lynched at the following Day Phase. If your assumption is correct, you will gain a 1-Shot Vigilante shot.
​
Win Condition:
You win when all members of the town and hostile neutrals are eliminated, or when your faction reaches majority.

Read full topic

item.source: [SFM] NUF FM - GAME OVER - Mafia, Zone and DatBird Victory

item.title: [SFM] NUF FM - GAME OVER - Mafia, Zone and DatBird Victory
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Also if any of you wanted to know my intention wasn’t to kill the entire mafia team off.
I decided that my first bus target would be PKR or Italy, and I settled on whichever one would look to be the best opportunity. I went after PKR, realised that he was getting cleared off of lolmeta so I went for Italy instead.

People then suddenly D2 decided to listen to my PKR ‘read’ and hung him. That’s two mafia down. Then D3 people lynched Ginger whom I didn’t really care about because my plan at that time was to have TrustworthyLiberal live. I then realised that TrustworthyLiberal wasn’t really doing anything so I gave them a perfectly viable claim of Town ‘Vengeful’ Bomb but ‘I’m gambler’ came into play

I had then to bullshit my way out of that one, which I did. However I knew at the time TrustworthyLiberal knew I was neutral. Unfortunately that came before I realised that they could use GreenCatKid’s ability for an extra vig and win the game. I was hoping that TrustworthyLiberal let me live because if they didn’t end the game and I died then TL would be obvious mafia (and therefore couldn’t afford to let me die)

So my plan was basically perfect except for the fact TrustworthyLiberal had an unfortunate dead-backup vig.

Read full topic
item.source: [SFM] NUF FM - GAME OVER - Mafia, Zone and DatBird Victory

Tbh, I was pretty much the only sane person in the town here and I was fighting hard for Cloned not to be ML’d and for EG/PKR to die.

After I died… yeah.

Light was Sane until he retracted his TL Scum Read and made it a Town Read.
